Wie Ihr das anstellt, ist Euch Ã¼berlassen: egal ob Regenschirme, Transparente, Warnweste, Luftballons, Scheinwerfer, BetttÃ¼cher, HÃ¤nde hoch... alles was den Zweck erfÃ¼llt ist willkommen und natÃ¼rlich freiwillig!Â visit:Â Â WebCam Â Â·Â  ImageÂ  Â· Â Wie loggt man einen WebCam-Cache?Go to the coordinates N54Â° 35.280' E10Â° 1.333'.Â You will be near to a indoor-webcam that takes a picture every minute.Now you need someone to save the picture of yourself taken by theÂ webcam or save it as a screenshot on your smartphone.Â To log this cache, you have to post this picture.
